keywords: BBQ chicken,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Chermoula Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut chicken into pieces (whatever / however many cuts you want).This recipe also does well as at flat half chicken but will take longer to cook.
Coat the marinade over the chicken and marinate for at least 1 hour.
Once done marinating, drizzle chicken with olive oil ready for cooking.
Heat up the bbq with a grill side until it's quite hot.
Cook the chicken, skin-side down, for 10 minutes, then turn it over and cook for a further 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Serve chicken with lime wedges and a fresh salad
Make the marinade - combine parsley, coriander, garlic, ginger, lime juice, chilli, salt, ground cumin, ground coriander into a mortar and pestle and grind til combined.
